snippet.title: The Journeyman Project: Pegasus Prime - official teaser trailer #2
snippet.description:
Pegasus Prime is finally here for Windows, MacOS and Linux! http://thejourneymanproject.com
Also available on GOG and Steam! http://store.steampowered.com/app/359420
http://facebook.com/TheJourneymanProject
http://twitter.com/JourneymanGames

A "director's cut" remake of the first Journeyman Project, this time travel adventure game was initially developed for Apple Pippin, Sony Playstation, Sega Saturn, and 3DO, but unfortunately did not get a wide release in the United States. Now, at last, the unreleased DVD-ROM version of the game has been ported to modern systems.

See the full official trailer at http://youtu.be/0OGqYZWkvwU
See the previous teaser clip at http://youtu.be/RqWI7uAEK58

©1996-2014 Presto Studios, Inc. All rights reserved.  The Journeyman Project, Pegasus Prime, and the Presto Studios logo are trademarks of Presto Studios, Inc.
